
Subject: Your VPS expires today

Hello %%%FIRST_NAME%%%,

Your Xen Virtual Server (VPS) %%%VPS_NUMBER%%%:%%%VPS_NODE%%%
has expired today, on the: %%%EXPIRATION_DATE%%%.

Please login into your control panel at

%%%DTC_CLIENT_URL%%%

with your login %%%DTC_ADM_LOGIN%%% click on your VPS tab, and renew it.

We will keep your VPS up few days to give you the time to renew your
contract. After the grace period your account will be deleted.

%%%SIGNATURE%%%
